itemLabel: Trevor Arthur Smith, Baron Smith of Clifton
itemDescription: British politician, academic and member of the House of Lords (1937-2021)

wikipedia_page.main: Trevor Arthur Smith, Baron Smith of Clifton,  (14 June 1937 – 24 April 2021) was a British politician, academic and member of the House of Lords. He was the Liberal Democrat spokesman in the House on Northern Ireland and constitutional affairs.
